channel.title: The dragon claw special isn't working?
channel.description: My d claw special isn't working, I just added it to get the special bar, I click the special bar while hitting one of my friends and he just does a normal attack, the special attack highlights up but no energy is drained? What could I edit to make it that the energy gets drained and I can physically see the special attack?

item.title: The dragon claw special isn't working?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

I figured it out on my own, thanks anyways.

Read full topic
item.source: The dragon claw special isn't working?

item.title: The dragon claw special isn't working?
item.dc:creator: @Spirit_Coder Spirit Coder
item.description:
@Spirit_Coder wrote:

I have got D claws & the spec works you need a file called Special.java that’s where to spec animation & stuff goes…

Read full topic
